title: Maya Rudolph On SNL, Self-Acceptance, And Seeing Yourself On Screen
description:
Maya Rudolph has had a successful career, spanning decades as a Saturday Night Live cast member and well-loved actor and entertainer. She chats with Sam about her recent Emmy nominations, her approach to comedy, and the importance of having strong role models.

You can follow us on Twitter @NPRItsBeenAMin and email us at samsanders@npr.org.
